name: Please Knock on My Door
description: A summary of every emotion you'd rather lock away and forget.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7-2700K @ 3.5GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Same Processor: Same Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Same Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommended resolution: 1920x1080
